title: Reconnaissance
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Hey, how about we go do some recon on Nijigaku?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>!? What are you saying all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>We don’t really know much about Lanzhu and Mia yet, right? Let’s go uncover some of their secrets.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What secrets....? If you want to be friends with them, can’t you just go visit them normally?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haaah!? Whoooooo ever said that Nico wants to be friends with them!? They’re rivals to me! We have to study our rivals, no!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Well, you’re not wrong, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Then we’re going. Ah, I wonder what souvenirs we should bring? Maybe some sweets from Honoka’s place would be good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Nico.... Are you sure you’re not going because you want to be friends with them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>N-, no! This is just.... stuff needed for our recon.... you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>*Sigh*. You’re so hesitant in the strangest ways, Nico. I sent a message to Ai just now. I said that we were coming over to play and bringing along some sweets. Come on, let’s go, Nico!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I’m telling you, it’s not like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
